name: the good shepherd
description:
The Good Shepherd 

this is a sheep herding simulator that takes a journey through time and  across borders, allowing you to exploring real satellite imagery from eastern Anatolia to Assyria  wile gaining educational queues about the history of the area . through progression of the game you will learn information that will contextualise your shepherds whereabouts & maybe help you understand who your shepherd is. 

well that's the idea, until then here's a first level for you to practice rounding your flock, find techniques and get a taste of what's to come. 

please  view game devlog for more information 

your starting location is 57km from the ancient Mesopotamian Temple "Gobekli Tepe" you've got a long journey ahead !
